name: Blocy
description:
An extremely challenging platformer-puzzler, where you have ONLY ONE block to finish the level. See if you can beat this insane challenge (This is 100% clickbait language, but it is actually insanely hard).

Use the a/left and d/right keys to move and left click to place your block. But be careful, you can't stand on the block forever.

But most importantly, have fun!
